definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :1Sa 14:29 honey (named from colour acc. to Fl NHWB:i. 430; Ar. dibsun (dubsun, dibisun) date-honey; NH [[דְּבַשׁ]], Aram. [[דּובשא]], dba4, deb4o0, honey both of fruits and of bees; cf. also As. disûpu COT:Gloss Zim:BP 84 Dl:Pr 70)—abs. ´[[ד]] Ge 43:11 + 33 t.; [[דְּבָָשׁ]] Ex 3:8 + 18 t.; sf. [[דִּבְשִׁי]] Ct So 5:1; —honey, product of bees, used as food Ju Jdg 14:8, Jdg 14:9, Jdg 14:18 (in lion's carcass); found in (clefts of) rock De 32:13 ([[מִסֶּלַע]] ´[[ד]], in song, JE), Ps 81:17 (´[[מִצּוּר ד]]); in forest, on ground 1Sa 14:25 ([[על־פני השׂדה]]) v:1Sa 14:26 (´[[הֵלֶח ד]]; but read rather [[הָלַח דְּבׂרוֹ]] its bees had departed, We Dr after LXX) v:1Sa 14:29, v:1Sa 14:43; transported in jar or bottle ´[[בַּקְבֻּק ד]] 1Ki 14:3; contrib. to priests and Levites 2Ch 31:5; ‖[[חֶמְאָה]] 2Sa 17:29, Is 7:15, Is 7:22 (in last two the being limited to such food is apparently token of destitution); kept in store Je 41:8; a choice gift Ge 43:11 (J); article of trade Ez Eze 27:17 (in these two perh. = grape syrup, mod. dibs, cf. Di Ge 43:11 v. Rob:BR ii. 81); forbidden as burnt offering Le 2:11 (‖[[שְׂאׂר]]); honey comb = ´[[יַעְרַת הַדּ]] 1Sa 14:27 (cf. [[יַעְרִי]] Ct So 5:1); also ´[[חוּף ד]]Pr 16:24 (cf. [[נׁפֶת חופים]] Ps 19:11); most often in phrase describing abundance in land of Canaan ´[[אֶרֶץ זׇבַת חָלָב וּד]] Ex 3:8, Ex 3:17, Ex 13:5, Ex 33:3 (all JE) Le 20:24 (H) Nu 13:27, Nu 14:8, Nu 16:18, Nu 16:14 (all JE) De 6:3, De 11:9, De 26:9, De 26:15, De 27:3, De 31:20 (all D) Jos 5:6 (D) Je 11:5, Je 32:22, Ez Eze 20:6, Eze 20:15; cf. De 8:8, 2Ki 18:32 (of land of captivity, words of the Rabshak); v. also Ez Eze 16:13, Eze 16:19, Job 20:17 [[וְחֶמְאָה]] ´[[נַחֲלֵי ד]]; honey, used to illustrate moral teachings Pr 24:13 (‖[[נׁפֶת]]), Pr 25:16, Pr 25:27 (danger of surfeit); sim. of sweetness of taste Ez Eze 3:3 (the roll), cf. [[כְּחַפִּיחִת]] ´[[בִּד]] Ex 16:31 (P; description of manna); of sweetness of the law Ps 19:11 (‖[[נׁפֶת חוּפִים]]) cf. Ps 119:103; (of pleasant words Pr 16:24 cf. supr.); sweetness of lips [[וְחָלָב]] ´[[ד]] Ct So 4:11; fig. of love [[דִּבְשִׁי]] Ct So 5:1 (‖[[יַעְרִי]], [[יֵינִי]], [[חֲלָבִי]]).
